Name: Chestnut (PH)
Description: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!

DescriptionLocalization.es: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Die stacheligen Schalen verstecken im Inneren eine köstliche Nuss. Vorsicht beim Schälen!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.hu: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.it: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.pt: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Под колючей скорлупой скрывается вкусный орех. Будьте осторожны при очистке!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: The spiny shells hide a delicious nut on the inside. Careful when peeling!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 多刺的外壳里面藏着一颗美味的坚果。剥皮时要小心！
